languages.text: {n}Он поднимает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Но я слыхал о вас, о да! Ваша {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}слава{/d} добралась даже до Простора. Негоже мне слабость проявлять и перед столь именитым человеком позориться..." {n}Он оправляет униформу и вытягивается по струнке.{/n} "Мастер орудий имеет доложить, что остатки арсенала удалось уберечь, а батарея в исправном состоянии. Мы готовы дать бой, если на то будет воля Лорд-капитана!"

{n}He looks up at you.{/n} "But I've heard of you, oh yes! Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} has reached even as far as the Expanse. I can't be showing myself up in front of an illustrious person such as yourself..." {n}He adjusts his uniform and stands ramrod straight.{/n} "The Master of Ordnance can report that the rest of the arsenal has been saved and the battery is in good order. We are ready to fight, if that is the Lord Captain's will!"
languages.original_text: {n}Он поднимает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Но я слыхал о вас, о да! Ваша {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}слава{/d} добралась даже до Простора. Негоже мне слабость проявлять и перед столь именитым человеком позориться..." {n}Он оправляет униформу и вытягивается по струнке.{/n} "Мастер орудий имеет доложить, что остатки арсенала удалось уберечь, а батарея в исправном состоянии. Мы готовы дать бой, если на то будет воля Лорд-капитана!"

I can't be showing myself up in front of an illustrious person such as yourself..." {n}He adjusts his uniform and stands ramrod straight.{/n} "The Master of Ordnance can report that the rest of the arsenal has been saved and the battery is in good order. We are ready to fight, if that is the Lord Captain's will!"

We are ready to fight, if that is the Lord Captain's will!"

I can't be showing myself up in front of an illustrious person such as yourself..." {n}He adjusts his uniform and stands ramrod straight.{/n} "The Master of Ordnance can report that the rest of the arsenal has been saved and the battery is in good order. {n}He looks up at you.{/n} "But I've heard of you, oh yes! Your fame has reached even as far as the Expanse. I can't be showing myself up in front of an illustrious person such as yourself..." {n}He adjusts his uniform and stands ramrod straight.{/n} "The Master of Ordnance can report that the rest of the arsenal has been saved and the battery is in good order. We are ready to fight, if that is the Lord Captain's will!"

languages.text: {n}他抬头看着你。{/n}“不过我听说过您，没错！您煊赫的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}名声{/d}早已传到了科罗努斯扩区。我甚至不敢想象，我居然真的能亲眼见到像您这么了不起的人……”{n}他整理了一下制服，站得笔直。{/n}“军械大师向您报告，剩余的军械都已经保存完毕，宏炮状况良好。只要您愿意，舰长大人，我们随时可以战斗！”
languages.original_text: {n}He looks up at you.{/n} "But I've heard of you, oh yes! Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} has reached even as far as the Expanse. I can't be showing myself up in front of an illustrious person such as yourself..." {n}He adjusts his uniform and stands ramrod straight.{/n} "The Master of Ordnance can report that the rest of the arsenal has been saved and the battery is in good order. We are ready to fight, if that is the Lord Captain's will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}他抬头看着你。{/n}“不过我听说过您，没错！您煊赫的名声早已传到了科罗努斯扩区。我甚至不敢想象，我居然真的能亲眼见到像您这么了不起的人……”{n}他整理了一下制服，站得笔直。{/n}“军械大师向您报告，剩余的军械都已经保存完毕，宏炮状况良好。只要您愿意，舰长大人，我们随时可以战斗！”

languages.text: {n}Te mira.{/n} «¡Pero he oído hablar de usted, sí! Su {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fama{/d} ha llegado hasta aquí, en la Extensión. Menudo espectáculo estoy dando ante alguien tan ilustre...». {n}Se ajusta el uniforme y se endereza.{/n} «Como Señor de la Artillería, le informo de que hemos podido salvar el resto del arsenal y de que la batería está plenamente operativa. Lord Capitán, ¡si desea que entremos en combate, estaremos listos para ello!».
languages.original_text: {n}He looks up at you.{/n} "But I've heard of you, oh yes! Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} has reached even as far as the Expanse. I can't be showing myself up in front of an illustrious person such as yourself..." {n}He adjusts his uniform and stands ramrod straight.{/n} "The Master of Ordnance can report that the rest of the arsenal has been saved and the battery is in good order. We are ready to fight, if that is the Lord Captain's will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Te mira.{/n} «¡Pero he oído hablar de usted, sí! Su fama ha llegado hasta aquí, en la Extensión. Menudo espectáculo estoy dando ante alguien tan ilustre...». {n}Se ajusta el uniforme y se endereza.{/n} «Como Señor de la Artillería, le informo de que hemos podido salvar el resto del arsenal y de que la batería está plenamente operativa. Lord Capitán, ¡si desea que entremos en combate, estaremos listos para ello!».

languages.text: {n}彼はこちらを見上げる。{/n}「ですが、私はあなたの噂を耳にしたことがあります！あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}名声{/d}は、エクスパンスの果てまでも轟いている。あなたのような高名な人物の前で、己を曝け出すわけには…」{n}彼は制服を整え、背筋を伸ばして立っている。{/n}「マスター・オヴ・オードナンスより報告申し上げます。残りの武器庫は無事であり、バッテリーも正常です。ロード・キャプテンがお望みとあらば、戦う準備はできています！」
languages.original_text: {n}He looks up at you.{/n} "But I've heard of you, oh yes! Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} has reached even as far as the Expanse. I can't be showing myself up in front of an illustrious person such as yourself..." {n}He adjusts his uniform and stands ramrod straight.{/n} "The Master of Ordnance can report that the rest of the arsenal has been saved and the battery is in good order. We are ready to fight, if that is the Lord Captain's will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はこちらを見上げる。{/n}「ですが、私はあなたの噂を耳にしたことがあります！あなたの名声は、エクスパンスの果てまでも轟いている。あなたのような高名な人物の前で、己を曝け出すわけには…」{n}彼は制服を整え、背筋を伸ばして立っている。{/n}「マスター・オヴ・オードナンスより報告申し上げます。残りの武器庫は無事であり、バッテリーも正常です。ロード・キャプテンがお望みとあらば、戦う準備はできています！」

languages.text: {n}Il lève les yeux vers vous.{/n} « Mais j'ai entendu parler de vous, ça oui ! Votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}réputation{/d} vous a {mf|précédé|précédée} dans les Étendues. Je dois me comporter correctement en présence d'un personnage aussi illustre que vous... » {n}Il ajuste son uniforme et se tient droit comme un piquet.{/n} « Le maître de l'artillerie confirme que le reste de l'arsenal est intact et que la batterie est toujours opérationnelle. Nous sommes prêts à nous battre, si telle est la volonté {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ! »
languages.original_text: {n}He looks up at you.{/n} "But I've heard of you, oh yes! Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} has reached even as far as the Expanse. I can't be showing myself up in front of an illustrious person such as yourself..." {n}He adjusts his uniform and stands ramrod straight.{/n} "The Master of Ordnance can report that the rest of the arsenal has been saved and the battery is in good order. We are ready to fight, if that is the Lord Captain's will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Il lève les yeux vers vous.{/n} « Mais j'ai entendu parler de vous, ça oui ! Votre réputation vous a {mf|précédé|précédée} dans les Étendues. Je dois me comporter correctement en présence d'un personnage aussi illustre que vous... » {n}Il ajuste son uniforme et se tient droit comme un piquet.{/n} « Le maître de l'artillerie confirme que le reste de l'arsenal est intact et que la batterie est toujours opérationnelle. Nous sommes prêts à nous battre, si telle est la volonté {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ! »

languages.text: {n}Er blickt zu dir auf.{/n} "Aber ich habe von Euch gehört, oh ja! Euer {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}Ruhm{/d} ist Euch sogar in die Ausdehnung vorausgeeilt. Ich darf mich vor einer solch illustren Person wie Euch nicht aufspielen ..." {n}Er zupft seine Uniform zurecht und richtet sich kerzengerade auf.{/n} "Der Artillerieoffizier kann berichten, dass der Rest des Arsenals gerettet wurde und die Batterie unbeschädigt ist. Wir sind bereit zu kämpfen, wenn das der Wille des Lord Captains ist!"
languages.original_text: {n}He looks up at you.{/n} "But I've heard of you, oh yes! Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} has reached even as far as the Expanse. I can't be showing myself up in front of an illustrious person such as yourself..." {n}He adjusts his uniform and stands ramrod straight.{/n} "The Master of Ordnance can report that the rest of the arsenal has been saved and the battery is in good order. We are ready to fight, if that is the Lord Captain's will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Er blickt zu dir auf.{/n} "Aber ich habe von Euch gehört, oh ja! Euer Ruf ist Euch sogar in die Ausdehnung vorausgeeilt. Ich darf mich vor einer solch illustren Person wie Euch nicht aufspielen ..." {n}Er zupft seine Uniform zurecht und richtet sich kerzengerade auf.{/n} "Der Artillerieoffizier kann berichten, dass der Rest des Arsenals gerettet wurde und die Batterie unbeschädigt ist. Wir sind bereit zu kämpfen, wenn das der Wille des Lord Captains ist!"

languages.text: {n}Başını kaldırıp sana bakıyor.{/n} "Lakin isminizi duydum! {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}Ününüz{/d} Enginlik'e kadar ulaştı. Sizin gibi şanlı ve şerefli bir şahsiyet karşısında dikbaşlılık yapmak ne haddime." {n}Üniformasını düzeltip karşında filinta gibi dimdik duruyor.{/n} "Mühimmat Ustadı, cephaneliğin kalanının kurtarıldığını ve bataryanın iyi durumda olduğunu bildirir. Lord Kaptan arzu ederse savaşmaya hazırız!"
languages.original_text: {n}He looks up at you.{/n} "But I've heard of you, oh yes! Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} has reached even as far as the Expanse. I can't be showing myself up in front of an illustrious person such as yourself..." {n}He adjusts his uniform and stands ramrod straight.{/n} "The Master of Ordnance can report that the rest of the arsenal has been saved and the battery is in good order. We are ready to fight, if that is the Lord Captain's will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Başını kaldırıp sana bakıyor.{/n} "Lakin isminizi duydum! Ününüz Enginlik'e kadar ulaştı. Sizin gibi şanlı ve şerefli bir şahsiyet karşısında dikbaşlılık yapmak ne haddime." {n}Üniformasını düzeltip karşında filinta gibi dimdik duruyor.{/n} "Mühimmat Ustası, cephaneliğin kalanının kurtarıldığını ve bataryanın iyi durumda olduğunu bildirir. Lord Kaptan arzu ederse savaşmaya hazırız!"
